config.browseDirectoryTitle: Click to browse for a directory
config.providerSetupDescription: Configure a model provider and run a connection test before saving.
config.autoSaveHint: Changes are automatically saved and will be applied when switching to the Source tab. Token count estimates help with optimizing context for large repositories.
config.includeExtensionsTitle: Only process files with these extensions
config.includeExtensionsHint: One extension per line (include the dot)
config.excludePatternsHint: One pattern per line (using glob pattern)
config.configSummary: Configure which file types to include and patterns to exclude in the analysis.
config.providerTestDisabled: Provider connection testing is disabled outside dev mode.
config.providerFixBeforeTesting: Fix provider settings before testing the connection.
config.providerUnavailable: Provider connection testing is unavailable in this build.

validation.apiKeyRequired: API key is required for this provider.
validation.baseUrlProtocol: Base URL must use http or https.
validation.baseUrlValid: Base URL must be a valid URL.

source.browseDirectoryTitle: Click to browse for a directory

processed.refreshCodeTitle: Reload selected files and regenerate output with latest content
processed.contentReady: Content is ready to be saved
processed.noProcessedContentHint: Go to the Source tab to select files, then analyze and process them.

fileTree.emptyHint: Select a directory to view files

errors.selectRootAndFiles: Please select a root directory and at least one file.
errors.noValidFiles: No valid files selected for analysis. Please select files within the current directory.
errors.processingFailed: An error occurred while processing the repository. Check the console for details.
errors.directoryLoadFailed: An error occurred while loading directory content. Check the console for details.
errors.noFilesSelectedForProcessing: No files are selected for processing. Please go to the Source tab and select files.
errors.refreshFailed: An error occurred while refreshing content. Check the console for details.
errors.saveFailed: An error occurred while saving the file. Check the console for details.
